availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, teamster. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Crockett Steers in Kenton County, Kentucky, on December 20, 1845. Father of Mary A. Steers, Martha Steers, Sarah J. Steers, Eliza Steers, Thomas Steers, Minerva Steers, Emma Steers, Kate Steers, Richmond Steers, and Belville Steers. Teamster in Covington, Kentucky, in 1850. Teamster in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 6, p. 317A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, KentonCounty, Covington Ward 6, p. 851.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 9, p. 206A.
Northern Kentucky Marriages, 1795-1850, Ancestry, Kenton County, Kentucky, 1845.
